title: 820-4924 powers button only works if pressed for a long time
message:
820-4924 if charger is plug in the power button works fine if it not plug in and i press power button nothing i have to hold it for a long time 
with a usb current meter i see it turn on then off then on again

title: 820-4924 powers button only works if pressed for a long time
message:
Any history available?
Did PRAM reset?
Tried known good battery?
Battery is charging?

title: 820-4924 powers button only works if pressed for a long time
message: yes did a pram reset and battery is good and charging if i hold the power button for 10 seconds with out power card it will turn on with power cord it turns on 2 seconds

title: 820-4924 powers button only works if pressed for a long time
message: With battery connected, pressing long time power button, does it start with fan at max speed?

title: 820-4924 powers button only works if pressed for a long time
820-4924 powers button only works if pressed for a long time
message: Did you really try another battery?

title: 820-4924 powers button only works if pressed for a long time
820-4924 powers button only works if pressed for a long time
message: i press a long time it turns on but not with the fan fast its normal i tried a different battery same thing

title: 820-4924 powers button only works if pressed for a long time
message:
Fan should not spin at all when board starts.
Start in diagnose mode, battery and charger connected; see if any error reported.
